editions.effect:
Materialize a Bullet card from your material deck, then you may put two **durability** counters on a Gun weapon you control. If you do, put CARDNAME on the bottom of your champion's lineage.

**Inherited Effect:** This object %has%gets% -2 [LIFE].
editions.effect_raw:
Materialize a Bullet card from your material deck, then you may put two durability counters on a Gun weapon you control. If you do, put Load Soul on the bottom of your champion's lineage.

Inherited Effect: This object gets -2 LIFE.

rule.description: You may choose to fail to find a card from your material deck to materialize.
You still pay the costs of the materialization.
